attributes.action: Effectively Fix the Global Financial System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Subject: Effectively Fixing the Global Financial System
(My comments about the actual credit crunch)

Dear Mr. PM Brown,

At the heart of the actual financial system crisis are the structured financial products like Credit Default Swaps CDS, and other products which have lead to the actual credit trust 
dislocations worldwide.
As long the as financial institutions have to perform on these bad risk spreading contracts, the global financial system will continue to be severely compromised.
These contracts have been used to pass on bad credit risks to others parties creating the distrust banks have now with each other.
The only way to effectively finish the crisis is to have these contracts made illegal and void by the governments of the G-8 countries.
Doing so will lead to the situation where every financial institution 
on the globe becomes responsible again to bear their own risks instead of trying to insure these risks through third parties, as is the rule now.

THIS IS THE ONE AND ONLY RESET BUTTON TO THE CREDIT CRISIS!!!

Sincerely,
Charles A. Amlinger
Economist, lic.rer.pol.
Switzerland
